column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I know I'll come back to Common Bond not because I'm in love with it
column2: but because it's just so conveniently located (off Westheimer near Montrose). If I were taking a friend shopping around the area and wanted a more chill place to hang out
column3: I'd definitely go here just because of the convenience factor (even though I love Agora
column5: Common Bond is much better suited for quiet/casual conversation). Also parking is not bad here at all. The ambiance is pretty bright and cheery
column6: so it's really easy to hang out here for awhile whether you're inside or on the patio. And if you're just craving baked goodness
column7: this is a really easy place to pop in and just grab a cookie or croissant to go.
